summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing preliminary engineering, preparation of plans, specifications and cost estimates for and the construction of the pavement Marking Demonstration program - Phase II (Centerline buttons and markers), III (plastic crosswalk lines) IV (plastic "school" legends, and V (plastic street markings); making a reimbursable appropriation from the Arterial City Street Fund; authorizing execution of an agreement with he State of Washington, Department of Highways, for reimbursement of the cost of construction and ratifying and confirming prior acts.
